about:
Hey there!
 Passionate for creative ideas and technologies solving real life problems, I am an enthusiast in the computer science world.
 Currently I am pursuing Master's in Computer Science and Engineering at The Ohio State University. My journey has been a fascinating blend of diverse experiences and tech-driven pursuits.

 Problem-solving is my forte, and I thrive on the challenge of debugging and troubleshooting technical issues. In my current research project with the US Navy, I'm focused on developing innovative solutions to streamline program performance through advanced debugging techniques. I'm excited to continue exploring the intersection of technology and problem-solving, making meaningful contributions along the way. Let's connect and discuss how we can make a difference together!
